channel.title: [tut] Creating a login system with php and MySQL
channel.description:
Well, I was browsing this and saw a few threads asking for help in this area and I have written a tutorial on it, so I figured I'd put this out there. It describes how to create a complete login system, including the register page, the login page, handling users, etc. Well, since this was too long, I'm hosting it somehwere else and just putting links to it here. I don't think this would be considered advertising since it links to a forum I hosted for my friends and no one ever goes there anymore. But if I'm wrong, just tell me. HEre is the table of contents:
[url=http://www.ezforum.org/dirtymustard/dirtymustard-post-239.html#239]Chapter 1: Starting Out[/url]
EDIT: Ok, seriously, something does not want me to post this. Ezforum won't let me make new topics on my own freaking forum. Please don't think I'm an idiot while I look for a different host :-[

item.title: [tut] Creating a login system with php and MySQL
item.dc:creator: @Drunkenoldma Drunkenoldma
item.description:
@Drunkenoldma wrote:

Ok post after this

Read full topic
item.source: [tut] Creating a login system with php and MySQL
